data.title: Burke County Man in Custody for Child Pornography
data.meta_description: Burke County Man in Custody for Child Pornography
data.text:
A Burke County man was taken into custody this morning after a Burke County Sheriff’s Office Special Response Team (SRT) executed a search warrant at his home in the 2200 block of Corley Road.

Sixty-two-year-old David Pritchett was charged with multiple counts of Possession of Child Pornography around 9:30 a.m.

Authorities say he had been the focus of a recent investigation by the Georgia Bureau of Investigation Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force. Authorities say they found several laptops and cellular devices that were collected as evidence in the case.

Pritchett was taken to the Burke County Detention Center where he’s been charged with 6 counts of Possession of Child Pornography and 2 counts of Possession of a Firearm by a Convicted Felon..

Mary Liz is the News Director and Co-Host of Augusta’s Morning News on WGAC. She spent 11 years as a News Director at an Indiana Radio Station. She has also worked as a former Police and Courts Reporter for The Republic Newspaper and Assistant Marketing Director of Merchants National Bank in Indianapolis. Mary Liz focuses most on local breaking news stories, feature stories on upcoming events, or community-service related organizations and the people who serve them. She has been with WGAC since 1995.
